_meanings:
{@--2@}
Having no interval or interstice
or pause (of space or time); compact, 

close; {#halo'naMtarAH saMyogaH#} <ls>P. I. 1. 7</ls>,
See {#saMyoga#}.

{@--6@} Belonging
to the caste immediately 
following; {#putrA ye'natarastrIjAH#} <ls>Ms. 10. 14.</ls>

{@--2@} Brahma, the supreme soul (as 
being of one entire essence).

_gram:
[Strictly it is <ab>acc.</ab> of time  
{#kAlAtyaMtasaMyogaH; nAsti aMtaraM yaTA syAttaTA#}]

_meanings:
the child of a 
Kshatriyā or Vaiśyā mother, by a father
belonging to the caste immediately
above the mother's, <ls>Ms. 10. 4.</ls>

a younger or elder sister;  
{#anuzWitAnaMtarajAvivAhaH#} <ls>R. 7. 32.</ls>; so {#°jAta#}.
